abstract: Standard & Poor’s Ratings Services said Thursday that it had cut its long-term ratings for Southwest Airlines to BBB from BBB-plus, even though the airline narrowed its loss during the third quarter. It said the outlook for Southwest was negative.
snippet: Standard & Poor’s Ratings Services said Thursday that it had cut its long-term ratings for Southwest Airlines to BBB from BBB-plus, even though the airline narrowed its loss during the third quarter. It said the outlook for Southwest was negative.
lead_paragraph: From Micheline Maynard, a DealBook colleague:

headline.main: Southwest Posts Loss and S.&P. Cuts Its Rating
